posts.post_title: FS: SGC 80 T206 Marquard, T207 SP Blackburne Miscut galore w/broadleaf back, other Ts
posts.post_content:
Prices include shipping with insurance. Payment via PayPal Payment Owed preferred, but checks and MO are absolutely fine as well. 
Offers are more than welcome, and e-mails to [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url] take priority. 

Thanks for looking. 

T207 SP: Russell (Lena) Blackburne with Broadleaf back, miscut galore: Taking offers to see if someone wants it more than me!
***I have been informed by a member that the player on the next card is Moriarty. Two for the price of one! 

T206:

T206 Rube Marquard Throwing SGC 80 6 PM 350-460: [STRIKE]$750[/STRIKE], $650.00

Sold one, but have some more to move. Getting married this Saturday...should I be nervous?
